I think I'll start with social media and email signature promotions. I've already got a decent following on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn, so I'll create some eye-catching graphics and share them on those platforms. I'll also add a link to my lead magnet in my email signature, so it's easily accessible to anyone I communicate with.

For social media, I'll create a series of posts that provide value and then mention my lead magnet as a bonus resource. I'll also use relevant hashtags to increase visibility and reach a wider audience. On LinkedIn, I'll share a more professional, in-depth post that highlights the benefits of my lead magnet.

By starting with social media and email signature promotions, I'll be able to reach my existing audience and encourage them to share my lead magnet with their networks. From there, I can experiment with other promotion strategies, like guest blogging and paid advertising, to reach new audiences.
